divs: Sighting DetailsYeah, I know it sounds ridiculous, but around 9:55 pm, my cousin and I were driving eastbound on Rt. 224 and witnessed 3 very-bright orange glowing object in the sky, flying in a "V" formation, heading West South West. The objects then seemed to dissipate into the night air. We had no idea what they could've been. 5 minutes later, another barrage of 3 appeared and were heading in the same direction and also disappeared in the same spot as the first three. We pulled over and grabbed something to eat at Steak-n-Shake. I went outside just to take another look and eventually the whole crew and all the customers came outside and were staring at 5 of these things, flying in the same direction and disappearing at the same point as the ones before them. In all, we saw 16 of these aircrafts. I tried to take pictures, but though the objects appeared in my viewfinder, they did not show up in the photographs.
Summary: 16 bright glowing orange/red objects flying 3 at a time in a "V" formation that disappeared into sky
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Boardman
There were no other sightings in Boardman on or around August 2nd 2009
